title: Mavado Interview
itunes:title: Mavado Interview
description:
Mavado stops by The Breakfast Club for the first time and addresses the police brutality in America and the parallelisms of American police brutality to that of Jamaica. The dancehall artist also spoke on squashing his beef with Vybz Kartel and doing a track together.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
